title: Glenn Howerton | Trump Holds Unhinged North Carolina Rally Without Coronavirus Precautions: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump holding an old-fashioned campaign rally in North Carolina, as if the coronavirus pandemic that’s still raging out of control had just magically disappeared.

Then, Glenn Howerton shares an update on life in California during the pandemic and wildfires and the return of A.P. Bio.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
